properties.description: SQL Script to query JSON files in datalake

content.query:
-- Create a db master key if one does not already exist, using your own password.
-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='<EnterStrongPasswordHere>';

-- Create a database scoped credential with the workspace managed IDENTITY
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [ba-synapse01-kn3acb6lw3vr4]
WITH IDENTITY = 'MANAGED IDENTITY'
